Hiking Mt Bogong (17th & 18th of November, 2012)

Mt Bogong (17th & 18th of November, 2012)

We headed up Mt Bogong, tramping up Staircase Spur to the summit, across Hells gap and down to the Cleve Cole Hut. Amazing weather all the way up and most of the way down.

  • The start of the walk and we are all fresh and ready to go
  • Two lizards hanging out in the sun
  • The first hut on the way up
  • Slowly heading up the ridge
  • Having a rest before the final push for the summut
  • Kicking back on the summit.
  • The view from our kitchen o Saturday night
  • The morning coffee
  • The end of the walk - Huzzah!
